title: Jordan Peterson’s Reasoning For Why People Are Leaving The Church |  Unapologetic 92

description: Jordan Peterson, in a conversation with Bishop Barron, shared his thoughts about why people are leaving the Church. In this episode, Bobby responds to Peterson and the Church.
